descriptions:
It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

It shares many blessings with
people who respect one another’s
rights and avoid needless strife.

As everyone knows, it visits peaceful
regions, bringing them gifts of kindness
and sweet blessings.

As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions,
bringing them gifts of kindness and
sweet blessings.

It shares many blessings with people who respect
one another’s rights and avoid needless strife.

These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near
conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they’ve hardly
been seen at all.

Known as a bringer of blessings, it’s
been depicted on good-luck charms
since ancient times.

Scant few have ever sighted this Pokémon. After studying what
literature remains, I am certain Togekiss will reveal itself when
peace reigns in the land.
name: Togekiss
